type: Legendary Creature – Human Mercenary Lord Demigod
rules_text:
Trample
[i]Vanguard[/i] – Whenever a nontoken Equipment you control enters, draw a card.
[i]Armory of Regalia[/i] – Ike, Wielder of Regalia gets +1/+1 for each legendary Equipment your control.
[i]Holy Blessing[/i] – Creatures you control that are equipped by legendary Equipment are indestructible.
